review: I had been using a shared Apple TV for several months. I ordered this one for myself the day after the opening of the June 2015 World Wide Developers Conference when it became clear that no new version was being announced by Apple in the immediate future. Although my smart TV has the two channels I use most often (Netflix and Amazon Instant Video), I enjoy the availability of the Apple TV's many channels that are not on my TV, such as PBS, and the integration with my family's iTunes libraries. In particular, my wife loves to stream her yoga podcasts to the big screen via Airplay.Screen mirroring is another big benefit. At my user group meetings we connect an Apple TV to a projector. Those of us with new-ish MacOS or iOS devices can take turns doing mini-demos by connecting in turn to the Apple TV. Sure beats connecting and disconnecting cables.
author: Jeffrey Frankel
